response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at an impressive $1,200,000 to us, reflecting its unique features, innovative technology, and unparalleled benefits.

We believe that this product could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors, offering solutions that are tailored to meet your specific needs. Our commitment to excellence ensures that you will receive not just a product, but a valuable asset that will contribute to your success.

Considering the substantial investment required, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving for you while still allowing us to cover our costs and maintain our business model.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We understand that decisions of this magnitude require careful consideration, and we are here to provide any additional information or support you might need throughout the process.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
